item.title: Raichur honour killing 3 sentenced to death nine get life term for murder of five family members
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur (Karnataka), Apr 9 (PTI) A court here has sentenced three people to death and handed life imprisonment to nine others for the brutal murder of five members of a family in Raichur district, a crime that stemmed from opposition to an inter-family marriage.
The killings occurred on July 11, 2020, in Sindhanur town, where five members of Mounesh’s family—his parents, his siblings were beaten to death.
The attack followed a confrontation at Mounesh’s residence between his in-laws and hi...]]>
